## Keyboard.usChar() method

Like `this.char` but only supports US Keyboard Characters. This is mainly a utility for TypeScript and autocomplete support when typing characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
usChar({ text, options, typing }: TextInputParams<SupportedCharacters>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { text, options, typing } | <code>TextInputParams&lt;SupportedCharacters&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
